name: Blue Reflection
Problem: Double Buffter V-Sync cause fps spike
Solution: NVidiaProfileInspector setting ตามรูป

name: RWBY: Grimm Eclipse
Solution: Navigate to your RWBY install folder, right-click the rwby-ge.exe,
Solution2: go to compatibility and chose compatibility mode for windows 7.

name: F.E.A.R 2 Project Origin
Solution: Extract the file X3DAudio1_5.dll to your main game folder.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands
Solution: Play in borderless mode with no v-sync

name: Resident Evil Revelations 2 / Biohazard Revelations
Solution: Change to 30fps before entering boss area

name: Call of Duty: Ghosts
Solution: Go to Steam/SteamApps/common/Call of Duty Ghosts/players2.
Solution2: Open config_mp.cfg. Change seta r_elevatedPriority `1` to seta r_elevatedPriority `0`.

name: Mass Effect
Solution: I went to 'Steam>SteamApps>common>Mass Effect>Binaries and i right click on 'Mass Effect.exe' then i change the compatibility as if it was windows xp.

name: Fallout4
Solution: Select Properties, select the Compatibility tab, and then select Override high DPI scaling behavior, scaling performed by: Application.
